Other Information.Test Conditions: 298.15 K, pressures ranging from 0.065 bar to higher values
Other Information.Additional Info: CO2 adsorption capacity is enhanced by encapsulated ionic liquids.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298.15 K, pressures ranging from low to high
Other Information.Additional Info: CH4 adsorption is less affected by ILs compared to CO2.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298.15 K, pressures ranging from low to high
Other Information.Additional Info: N2 adsorption is less affected by ILs compared to CO2.

Sieving Mechanism: Adsorption-based selectivity due to interactions with IL pairs.

Experimental Validation.Method: Grand Canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulations and Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/N2 selectivity: up to 200, CO2/CH4 selectivity: up to 150 (ideal selectivities at specific IL compositions)

Other Information.Additional Info: Encapsulation of ILs in ZIF-8 enhances CO2 selectivity and capacity significantly.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298.15 K, pressures ranging from 0.065 bar to higher values
Other Information.Additional Info: CO2 adsorption capacity is maximized at intermediate IL loading.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298.15 K, pressures ranging from low to high
Other Information.Additional Info: CH4 adsorption decreases linearly with increasing IL composition.

Other Information.Test Conditions: 298.15 K, pressures ranging from low to high
Other Information.Additional Info: N2 adsorption decreases linearly with increasing IL composition.

Sieving Mechanism: Enhanced adsorption sites for CO2 due to IL presence.

Experimental Validation.Method: Grand Canonical Monte Carlo (GCMC) simulations and Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: CO2/N2 selectivity: up to 200, CO2/CH4 selectivity: up to 150 (ideal selectivities at specific IL compositions)

Other Information.Additional Info: The [bmim+][Tf2N−] anion creates additional CO2 adsorption sites.

Other Information.Additional Info: Highest CO2 capacity observed among the studied ILs.
